changes.description: You can now generate a shareable link, that you can use to share your exports with others!
Fixed some bugs with the export modal, and dashboard overlay on exported videos.
Fixed translations not working in certain cases.
Cleaned up unused code and files.
Added Search Functionality to Settings.
Fixed an issue where users had to wait for the install button to appear because the download progress bar would not display on the update prompt. Despite it downloading.
Added the missing Mirror Cameras toggle in Settings back.
Overhauled the UI design to be more modern and user-friendly.
Increased the polling interval for support chat.
Added the ability to remove a folder/event using the Trash Can icon in the Clip Browser.
Fixed a critical issue that caused the Auto Updater to break on versions 2026.6.5 and 2026.6.6.
Fixed the Compact Dashboard Layout not resizing properly on smaller displays.
Fixed the Camera Glow/Highlight on Saved and Sentry Clip events not displaying properly.
Removed the fake brake autohold feature on the Dashboard to better represent what official is being shown by the SEI Data.
Added the accelerator pedal position to the SEI Dashboard on exported videos.
Added an Alpha Tag to the GPS Minimap export feature as it is still in development.
Added Fast Mini map improvement. This is only a fixed map not live like the main map for exporting.
improved live map export by 33% Thanks to Jeff
Update API To handle Updates. Client will now send Platform, Version, and UUID to help us with updates.
Added 12 hrs and 24 hrs settings to change format for Exported and UI Dashboards.
Added Map UI option to export clips (Beta)
Added option to  Load clips from a folder. No Tesla USB structure needed.
Added option to disable Mirrored cameras (L/R Repeaters, and Back camera) so they show Raw Orientation.
Removed Optimized Blur Due to Issue with it not working well with High contrast things. (Red text License plates)
Added New Blur Zone Options. Solid (Fast), Blur (Optimized But has issues with Red text/plates can be seen), True Blur (Slow).
Added Option for Solid Blur to Work with SEI Dashboard. (Blur, True Blur DO NOT WORK with Dashboard.)
Program Will now Auto select Language Based Screen Language OS is using.
Added more translation to other areas like (Support Chat, Settings tabs, Export module)
Fixed Some issues with Welcome module Not being translated and issues with HTML
Added Tool Tips Translation in all 13 Languages.
Fixed A bug where Translation was braking dynamic info of the Folders in clip browser.
Added Translations to Notifications for errors,info,etc
Fixed Steering Wheel being slightly Off in the UI for ALL Dashboards. Update Icon to 512x512 (Thanks JeffFromTheIRS)

Added Option for Accel Pedal to show Pressure.
- Added 3 options (On/Off (default), Fill (uses Icon As Bar), and Bar on Side) - Currently this is a UI Update only.

Added 13 NEW Languages:
Spanish,
French,
German,
Chinese (Simplified),
Japanese,
Korean,
Portuguese,
Russian,
Italian,
 Dutch,
Polish,
Turkish. (UI UPDATE ONLY NO EXPORT)
Added the ability for the map route line to display Blue/Gray depending on Self Driving/Manual driving state.
Added the ability to zoom in/out and pan around the map. (Hold and drag using right click to pan around the map)
Switched Map Data to OSM to resolve issues where CartoDB would not work in China.
Adjusted the consistency of the date/time formatting throughout the application. You can set your preferred format under Settings.
Fixed UTC time. We Changed time to UTC No matter the place. instead of Cars Timezone.
Fixed issue with MacOS exporting Compact Dashboard with Big assets.
Fixed an issue where the steering wheel would turn the wrong direction on exported video.
Fixed a bug with the time showing wrong by 1 hour during export.
Fixed an issue with MacOS exporting SEI Dashboard not looking similar to Windows.
Swapped positions on export overlay for time & gear. To give room to add the date when exporting.
Added an X-Large (55%) Option for Dashboard Size. This is Due to MacOS Retina making the dashboard look smaller then Windows. We recommend large (45%) for MacOS users.
Added date to SEI Dashboard when exporting.

versions.title: Fix Unicode characters & Update Dashboard Exporting

changes.description: Fixed an issue where Unicode characters were not being properly encoded causing folder/clip selection not working.
Improved the dashboard export layout and reduced the amount of time the pre-render takes by almost 99%.
Fixed an issue where Unicode characters were not being properly encoded causing folder/clip selection not working.
Bundled FFMPEG on MacOS instead of requiring homebrew installation.
Fixed an issue where Intel QuickSync would cause an export to fail.
Added a new Compact Dashboard option to Export. You can now choose between default and Compact.
Check out our new website at https://sentry-six.com
Fixed Compact Dashboard UI being able to be resized to small sized. Added a minimum size.
Added timestamp to Compact Dashboard UI.
Improved the support chat system. (You must update for the Support Chat system to work if you're on a old version.)
Fixed an issue where shortcuts would not register if you clicked the timeline.
Improved overall UI consistency and layout.
Fixed an issue where some shortcut keys would not work.
Fixed an issue where some buttons would stay focused and pressing the space key would trigger them.
Added the option to change the fast forward and backward duration under shortcuts.

versions.title: Addition of Export Blur Zones & Improvements

changes.description: You can now add blur zones to each individual camera before export. Blur zones can be useful to blur sensitive information before sharing such as, license plates, faces, locations, etc. Note that blur zones apply for the entire duration of the exported video.
Adjusted the TeslaCam folder selection to work with other folder names.

Added a new Support Ticket system which can be found with the support icon located on the playback bar. This replaces the old feedback and support id system. Leave feedback, bug reports and request troubleshooting through the support ticket system.
Adjusted the export progress bars to be sticky.
Fixed FFMPEG not being detected on Windows Automated Install
Fixed an issue where the Windows Installer failed to update due to an Application Still Open error.

versions.title: Added timestamp option for video exports

changes.description: Added an option to add a timestamp to exported footage without dashboard overlay burn in. There are additional date formats for international users.

Fixed an issue where the MacOS auto updater would not work on Automatic Installs. Affected Version: 2026.1.22. If you are on the affected version, please download the latest version from the GitHub releases page.
Added a new Send Feedback button that can be found in the Settings Menu. You can attach media to assist with feedback/bug reports.
Added a new compact dashboard layout which can be changed in the Settings menu.
Added MacOS Automatic Install .dmg file to current and all future releases.
Fixed an issue where the dashboard & map might disappear if you resized the application window after adjusting their position.
Fixed current time on export dashboard overlay being delayed. now will be accurate down to the Sec.
Fixed current time on export dashboard overlay not appearing.
Improved diagnostic system.
Fixed AMD GPU not being detected properly. Which was causing issues with GPU encoding.
Fixed UI issues and auto updater issues.
Fixed auto update system in preparation for .exe releases
Fixed AMD GPU not being detected properly.
Fixed map event pins not clearing properly.
Fixed video auto playing when paused and using seeking functions.
Fixed playback bar not updating after seeking while paused.
Revamped Diagnostic Support System to not rely on Third Party Services and added additional measures to protect user diagnostic data.
Reduced PII & not helpful support diagnostic data.
Updated default branch to main.
Added warning if no GPU is detected for export telemetry overlay toggle.
Cleaned up dead code & comments.
Removed legacy drag & drop code.
Removed some keybinds in favor of customizable keyboard shortcuts.
Added ability to check for updates without having to relaunch app.
Added ability to swap between Main and Dev-SEI Branch. Dev-SEI is now used for Beta.
Changed version naming to match year and week similar to Tesla's version naming.
Changed the camera export layout to match HW3/HW4 camera count.
Fixed playback bar jumping around to a different spot than selected.
Added new user welcome guide

versions.title: Add Classic Layout Setting & Ability to Minimize Export Modal during export

changes.description: Added ability to switch between Classic and Modern layout styles
Added ability to minimize export modal during export and see progress on a floating notification
Fixed a rare issue where updates would sometimes not work properly
Added a new diagnostics button to the settings modal that will generate a shareable id to share with the Sentry Six team for debugging purposes.

versions.title: Prevents modal from closing during update

changes.description: Prevents the update modal from closing during an update if the user attempts to close it.
Fixed changelogs not loading properly. Updated to grab changelog from github repo instead of locally due to inital testing..
Improved video export marker UX and layout
Fixed rare issue of export cancellation not working properly
Fixed FFmpeg memory leak
Improved GPU encoding & added HEVC encoder detection
Significantly reduced export time when Dashboard Overlay is enabled
Added ability for Maximum Quality export to be done with GPU if HEVC is available
Overhaul of Settings & Export UI to improve tidiness and match the design language between the modals
Added changelog viewer in Settings
New version-based update system with semantic versioning
Inital Release
